resources.string: Enterprise Admin Notification
Enterprise Admin Message
Authorization Failed
Change password
Logout
Cancel
LICENSE_CHANGED
PERMISSIONS_CHANGED
Your password has been reset by the admin. Please check your email to reset your password.
You have been made as a unmanaged user by the admin. To continue, please sign in again.
Your licence has been changed by the admin. To continue, please sign in again.
Changes to your account permissions by the administrator require you to re-login. You will be logged out.
Admin has enabled Single Sign-On authentication for your account. Please enter your enterprise credentials to continue accessing Kore.
Admin has disabled Single Sign-On authentication for your account. Please create a new password to continue accessing Kore.
Admin has ended your session. To continue, please sign in again.
Your account is suspended by your admin. Your session will now end. Please contact your admin.
Your account is currently suspended in Kore. Contact your system administrator to unlock the account.
Your session will now end. Please re-login again.
Your account has been deleted by your Admin.Please contact your Admin
The password for this account has expired. To continue, you must change your password.
The password for this account has expired. To continue, you must change your password.
The password for your account is about to expire %s. To continue, tap on Cancel. To change password, tap on change password
To continue, please sign in again

No subscriptions available.

OK

Please retry
Team Disabled
Log In Again
Your session has expired!. You will be logged out. Please re-login to continue.
You do not have any rooms to add people to this team
Your system administrator has disabled logging in via \'Mobile App\' for your account. Please login on an authorized channel.
